titleStmt.title: [T]haram Taniah, leader of the Lords Hosts, unto his brethren the Quakers scornfully so called, who are the children of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob; : who are circumcised in heart; : the Jewish race in descent, unto whom the promise was made, : I will turn them into my pure language, by taking away their stony hearts: : and they shall all tremble at my word.
titleStmt.author: Tany, Thomas, fl. 1649-1655.

titleStmt.title: [T]haram Taniah, leader of the Lords Hosts, unto his brethren the Quakers scornfully so called, who are the children of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob; : who are circumcised in heart; : the Jewish race in descent, unto whom the promise was made, : I will turn them into my pure language, by taking away their stony hearts: : and they shall all tremble at my word.
titleStmt.author: Tany, Thomas, fl. 1649-1655.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
